title: 10Smoke
author: 10Smoke
content: ***We follow all laws. We only ship to places where Kratom and/or Hemp-Derived THC Are Legal***Hello fellow Bitcoiners! I am pleased to announce that https://10smoke.com/ now accepts Bitcoin and most other Cryptocurrencies -- What defines 10Smoke is that I truly care about Kratom users. I've personally been using Kratom for 15+ years, and I understand how important this plant is for so many people. My mission is to ensure Kratom users have a place where they can get pure and effective Kratom 100% of the time -- I accomplish this via doing rigorous full-panel lab testing, all the Kratom is manufactured in a GMP certified facility, plus I try each batch personally to verify that it has optimal effects. I am a crypto expert and I do transactions old school style, so I have lots of flexibility to accept crypto and I'm not tied-down by the limited selection offered by crypto merchant gateways. Plus, I'm well versed in all types of cryptocurrency, so transactions with me will be professional and fast. 10Smoke has thousands of satisfied customers, and all orders are covered by a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee (I literally don't even leave 1 customer of mine with any dissatisfaction or problems, I go above and beyond with my customer service), so if you're looking to buy Kratom or Legal THC products with cryptocurrency, then 10Smoke is the perfect source for you!To order you can shop on our convenient and fast retail site https://10smoke.com/ , where you will find a full variety of alkaloid-rich and 100% pure Kratom Powders, Capsules, & Extracts -- Our pricing is phenomenal too with Powder at $70/Kilo & Capsules at $105/Kilo, plus all orders come with free items such as 100g bags of Kratom powder or Free Kratom Extract Shots -- Simply select crypto payment at checkout (other payment methods including Credit Card, Zelle, and Cash App are accepted as well)Additionally, 10Smoke offers an excellent variety of premium Legal THC (Hemp-Derived) vapes and edibles, including Delta-9, THC-A, THC-P, Delta-8, and Delta-10. You can also order directly from me via sending me a private message here on Bitcointalk, or call/text 305-707-1461 or e-mail info@tensmoke.com -- Also, you can contact me anytime if you need assistance using the website, or if you have Kratom and Legal THC questions. Even if you just have Kratom questions in general I am happy to answer them, so don't hesitate to reach out. One of my favorite things in life is helping my fellow Kratom users  Also notably, if you own a smoke shop or online ecommerce site and want to convert your crypto into product for your business, I do offer wholesale Kratom Powder, Capsules, & Extracts, including the finest ultra-purified Kratom Extracts in the world such as 50X,  45% Mit, and 75% Mit --- You can peruse the full wholesale catalog at this link https://10smoke.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/tens7704207.pdfBelow is the promotion this week, it will change from week to week, but I'll leave this promo active long-term in case anyone from here sees this later on -- The Diamond Shot is truly excellent, it's made with the most cutting-edge Kratom extract and gives maximum euphoria and invigoration. And I'm not just saying that, I've tried all the Kratom Shots and Extracts that exist over the past 15 years, and the Diamond Shot truly tops them all. https://i.ibb.co/647Gp2K/BDM613770-BH.jpgI look forward to providing you with the best Kratom and Legal THC! And I'm proud to have the opportunity to bring full-fledged crypto adoption into this market
